message.entry: Number of values must be same as number of properties.
{0} is not a valid property name
The generator polynomial must be a Galois row vector.
The generator polynomial must be of degree (N-K).
The coefficients of the generator polynomial must be binary
The generator polynomial must evenly divide X^n+1, where n is the length of a full length code
The generator polynomial must be a Galois row vector.
The BCH Encoder block must use a generator polynomial defined over GF(2)
